title: Dakcrypto
author: Dakcrypto
content: JUST FOR FUN Abeg who get food for house give me location make I come chop. I hear say all of una chop pizza for forum pizza day, abeg come give me my share for here. I create this thread so that we go vibe, gist us how your side dey be for this season, fuel price don add and every order things don high too. Share with us how you dey cop. Make sure say wetin you want talk funny oo¬†  na cruise thread be this.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: How you want to take get fuel come I said I here say town service transport for 9ja dons high pass TP to heaven, so I believe say e dey cheaper to reach God than to pay a visit to someone in Nigeria right now. So just go visit God and make you petition our matter before him, God fit touch Tinubu mind make him declare a public holiday to Mark next bitcoin pizza day.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on May 31, 2023, 11:49:32 PMHow you want to take get fuel come I said I here say town service transport for 9ja dons high pass TP to heaven, so I believe say e dey cheaper to reach God than to pay a visit to someone in Nigeria right now. So just go visit God and make you petition our matter before him, God fit touch Tinubu mind make him declare a public holiday to Mark next bitcoin pizza day. Omo bro this one burst my head oh, this issue of fuel is definitely making everyone stay home. But omo he touch everybody,¬† I believe that everyone needs to start controlling their movement. How many people can afford to buy fuel constantly? Once the price of gas changes, everything else is also affected. Returning to the OP, everyone is doing great and we are all just hoping for the best. However, since you started the thread, I believe that you should be the one to announce the location. Fun won't be bad at all. Op am definitely waiting for location.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: As you dey come house so you go carry one litre of fuel before I go allow you enter. Even as we dey suffer we still dey catch cruise, the price of fuel dey shock me people go soon start to sell their gen for second hand very soon, how people way get Benz dey cope with the new development. Make innocent motors do make electric cars cos to buy fuel don turn gold. Nepa sef go soon increase bill‚Ä¶.Wahala for who no get inverter or solar.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Menh I just surprised how we just have new president and everything changed immediately, fuel now like a precious gem were the price have skyrocketed to what I don't know in my area PHC. I think the last price which I bought it was around 589 per littre which I think isn't proper despite trying to remove fuel subsidy but it should be something gradually. Was his target to on fuel alone and why must he just make pronouncement immediately everything takes effects.However, lemme over look that because I know our voice won't be heard.¬† Omo we dey happy as oga bubu don tuama for seat say good go dey everywhere but e come be like say na the worse oo, like this self me still dey find am to take hold my side

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: By now nothing suppose still dey shock una for this country we dey because anything can happen at anytime and person like me just dey expect say one day we go need get reason to come outside üòÅTinubu¬† na one person wey right from even the end sar protest i realize say he know every bit of wetin him dey do and na one man wey understand¬† how power dey work and I no been dey expect anything less than a discipline and very strict governance wey no go put anyone to consideration, not even him caucus, especially if you try oppose am.Make we just dey believe in the Bible¬† scripture¬† wey talk say na God dey appoint a king¬† and see baba as who fit help because if we wan even judge from recent happenings,¬† then we get rights to say he start on a wrong note

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on May 31, 2023, 11:03:52 PMJUST FOR FUN Abeg who get food for house give me location make I come chop. I hear say all of una chop pizza for forum pizza day, abeg come give me my share for here. Me I get food ooo but I don‚Äôt know how u wan take reach myself because d amount wey u go spend before you reach my side go pass Wetin you go come chop for my side ooo. We no fit share pizza for forum now, if you wan chop pizza you go need locate me, and d way things be now, like say everybody go dey need stay him house ooo, you no fit commot anyhow again.Quote from: Dakcrypto on May 31, 2023, 11:03:52 PMI create this thread so that we go vibe, gist us how your side dey be for this season, fuel price don add and every order things don high too. Share with us how you dey cop. Make sure say wetin you want talk funny oo¬†  na cruise thread be this. My guy e no funny now ooo like say d lock down wey dey 2020 na play, na now we go enter another lock down, now wey fuel don increase nobody dey commot anyhow again ooo, everybody dey stay for house now ooo. even people wey get two cars for house before don dey sell one because of fuel, d once wey get 1 car don dey sell d one car dem dey¬† buy bike, fuel don do almost 3x now, anybody wey no get important place to go no dey commot anyhow again ooo, everybody dey seat for him house now.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Dakcrypto on May 31, 2023, 11:03:52 PMI hear say all of una chop pizza for forum pizza day, abeg come give me my share for here. So you hear say all of us chop pizza for forum on Pizza day, So why the person wey give you this update no tell you who been dey share the pizza? Bcos eh be like say you go go back go ask for the complete update about who been dey share am oh.. LolzSecondly.. Me wey dey plan to travel back from Ebonyi back to P.H very soon, I just pray make drivers no cut my head bcos of high price now oh, bcos I can remember paying 6k to come Ebonyi from P.H 2wks ago & eh go really pain me if I reach park when I want travel back to P.H from Ebonyi & con here say t.p don pass 8k or 9k base on this fuel matter.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on June 01, 2023, 02:28:18 PMQuote from: Wiwo on May 31, 2023, 11:49:32 PMHow you want to take get fuel come I said I here say town service transport for 9ja dons high pass TP to heaven, so I believe say e dey cheaper to reach God than to pay a visit to someone in Nigeria right now. So just go visit God and make you petition our matter before him, God fit touch Tinubu mind make him declare a public holiday to Mark next bitcoin pizza day. Omo bro this one burst my head oh, this issue of fuel is definitely making everyone stay home. But omo he touch everybody,¬† I believe that everyone needs to start controlling their movement. How many people can afford to buy fuel constantly? Once the price of gas changes, everything else is also affected. Returning to the OP, everyone is doing great and we are all just hoping for the best. However, since you started the thread, I believe that you should be the one to announce the location. Fun won't be bad at all. Op am definitely waiting for location.This all ball down to the same thing, economic crisis, this subsidy removal will ushar in a new inflation rate that will most likely since the nation economy into another recession, the best form of storage right now is bitcoin and gold so I advice everyone to stock up their bitcoin and continue to hold until the aim is reached, so even if the domestic economy is messed up, you still have an alternative that is under. Your control.Because, the way things go, in no time the cost of basic essential needs will skyrocket and this all balls down to more hardships to the mase.
